title: Randi Rhodes Show with Nicole Sandler - October 25 2013
description:
October 25, 2013
The Randi Rhodes Show 

It's Friday, ya bastids!

Randi will be back from vacation on Monday. Nicole Sandler's sitting in again today with the latest news and some great guests too...

Developing: Japan Hit By 7.3-Magnitude Earthquake Off Fukushima Coast, Tsunami Advisory Issued

While much of America was preoccupied with the shutdown and then the rocky launch of Healthcare.gov, there was plenty of cheating, lying, and bribery going on... Election integrity crusader Brad Friedman of 'The Brad Blog' broke the story this week of massive voting machine & ATM corporation Diebold being charged by the U.S. Attorney with bribery, falsifying documents, and a "worldwide pattern of criminal conduct." He'll talk with Nicole about the case and what it could mean for touch-screen voting.

With former NSA Director Michael Hayden acting like a fool, more leaks from Edward Snowden, and news that Germany and France are angry about the NSA spying on them, now more than ever, Americans believe our surveillance state needs to be reigned in. Tim Karr of FreePress.net will join us to discuss this weekend's 'Stop Watching Us' rally in Washington, DCÃ¢â‚¬â€and what you can do to push Congress into demanding accountability and reforming our security state.

Finally, Julianna Forlano of Absurdity Today will stop by for a week-in-review of what has been an absolutely crazy week of news.
